title: Great Porter Square (Somerville) 3 Bedroom
posting_body: ['For the most up to date information, visit: <URL>', 'RCG LLC 617-625-8315', '<URL>', 'Rent Directly From RCG and Pay No Fee!', 'This is for an apartment rental.', 'RCG does not rent by the room.', 'VIRTUAL TOUR: https://kuula.co/share/collection/7qtKv?logo=0&info=0&fs=1&vr=1&sd=1&initload=0&thumbs=1', 'Available for lease beginning 9/1/22  Ideally located 3BR apartment with large eat-in-kitchen, spacious living room, and bonus fully enclosed three season porch!', '  Features include hardwood floors, in-unit laundry, large bedrooms with high ceilings, loads of natural sunlight, and much more.', '   This property is located steps to the many shops, restaurants, and the Red Line T in Porter Square.', '87 and 83 bus at the end of the block.', '  No dogs.', '5d1227lyy7ynfio']
